channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Driver Purposely Plows Car Into Crowd in L.A., Injuring at Least 30, Officials Say
item.description: Seven people were in critical condition after the driver veered onto a sidewalk outside a music club, officials said. The driver was booted from the c...

item.title: Number of Missing in Kerr County, Texas, After Floods Drops to 3
item.description: The new figure was a significant decline from 97 just days ago. The death toll in the county remained the same, and officials said many of the missing...

item.title: Cuts to public media will smash budgets of some local radio stations

item.title: Heavy Rains in Washington Area Flood Roads and Prompt Water Rescues

item.title: The K-Pop Band Big Ocean Is Making Waves With Sign Language
item.description: Big Ocean, a boy band whose members are deaf or hard of hearing, has found success with a mix of singing and signing.

item.title: Police are investigating a man's death after he was pulled into MRI machine

item.title: Examining the role of men in the gender gap in American society
item.description: The latest season of the podcast "Unsettled" from Iowa Public Radio looks at how gender affects people's everyday lives.

item.title: Pet Owner Flooded With Puzzling Calls About a Lost Cat While Hers Is Safely at Home
item.description: Natasha Lavoie’s phone number appeared on a T-shirt sold online that advertised a fictitious missing cat. She can’t stop the calls from coming.
